summary: Permanently increases the maximum PP of a single move by 20% of its original base PP (up to 3 uses per move).
typical_users: Pokémon relying on low-PP, high-power moves (e.g., Hydro Pump, Fire Blast)
Stall or utility Pokémon needing more uses of recovery or status moves
Generally used in teambuilding preparation, not held during battle.
